name: Blobia
description:
Blobia is a submission to the Scratch Jam 2022.

Blobia is a puzzle game where you need to figure out how to get the blue box to the pink "portal" by placing down objects.

The theme of the jam was: " You Control The Game, Not The Player"

The scratch page is here so check that out if you want to play it. 

(There is also a downloadable version if you are going to vote.)
